name: Subnet Island
description:
This is a simple game to randomly generate host/netmask pairs, and ask students questions about them. It is part of a series of educational/academic practice games that I plan to work on.

This is currently a work in progress, with some placeholder assets. I also plan to add a few additional features to include the ability to use a custom seed so several students can all start on the same island.

Move: W/A/S/D
Change Fruit: Left/Right
Flags: Q/E
Place Fruit: Up/Down
Question Menu: Space
New Island: N
